Title: Relates to the sale of children's jewelry containing lead
Summary: Relates to the sale of children's jewelry containing lead; establishes that beginning July 1, 2021 the sale of children's jewelry containing a certain lead content without a warning statement is prohibited.
LawCode: Amd ยง37-0115, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the sale of children's jewelry containing lead
